1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Term
4  ( ropsTerm,
5    -- * pick
6    consPick, relmapPick, relkitPick,
7    -- * cut
8    consCut, relmapCut, relkitCut,
9    -- * pick-term
10    consPickTerm, relmapPickTerm, relkitPickTerm,
11    -- * cut-term
12    consCutTerm, relmapCutTerm, relkitCutTerm,
13    -- * move
14    consMove, relmapMove, relkitMove,
15    -- * rename
16    consRename, relmapRename,
17  ) where
18
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base             as B
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax           as S
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data             as D
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core             as C
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base         as Op
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Message as Msg
25
26
27-- | Relmap operators for manipulating term names.
28--
29--   [@cut@]        Project relation to unspecified terms.
30--
31--   [@cut-term@]   Project relation to terms not in relmap output.
32--
33--   [@pick@]       Project relation to specified terms.
34--
35--   [@pick-term@]  Project relation to terms in relmap output.
36--
37--   [@rename@]     Change term name.
38--
39--   [@move@]       Change heading.
40--
41ropsTerm :: (Ord c) => [C.Rop c]
42ropsTerm = Op.ropList "term"  -- GROUP
43    --         CONSTRUCTOR        USAGE                      ATTRIBUTE
44    [ Op.def   consCut            "cut /P ..."               "-term*"
45    , Op.def   consCutTerm        "cut-term /R"              "-relmap/"
46    , Op.def   consPick           "pick /P ..."              "-term*"
47    , Op.def   consPickTerm       "pick-term /R"             "-relmap/"
48    , Op.def   consRename         "rename /N /P ..."         "-term*"
49    , Op.def   consMove           "move /P ... -to /N ..."   "-from* . -to"
50    ]
51
52
53
54-- ----------------------  pick & cut
55
56consPick :: C.RopCons c
57consPick med =
58  do ns <- Op.getTerms med "-term"
59     Right $ relmapPick med ns
60
61relmapPick :: C.Intmed c -> [S.TermName] -> C.Relmap c
62relmapPick med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitPick
63
64relkitPick :: [S.TermName] -> C.RelkitFlow c
65relkitPick = relkitProject (D.ssRShare, D.ssRShare)
66
67consCut :: C.RopCons c
68consCut med =
69  do ns <- Op.getTerms med "-term"
70     Right $ relmapCut med ns
71
72relmapCut :: C.Intmed c -> [S.TermName] -> C.Relmap c
73relmapCut med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitCut
74
75relkitCut :: [S.TermName] -> C.RelkitFlow c
76relkitCut = relkitProject (D.ssRSide, D.ssRSide)
77
78
79-- ----------------------  pick-term & cut-term
80
81consPickTerm :: C.RopCons c
82consPickTerm med =
83  do rmap <- Op.getRelmap med "-relmap"
84     Right $ relmapPickTerm med rmap
85
86relmapPickTerm :: C.Intmed c -> C.Relmap c -> C.Relmap c
87relmapPickTerm med = C.relmapBinary med relkitPickTerm
88
89relkitPickTerm :: C.RelkitBinary c
90relkitPickTerm = relkitProjectTerm (D.ssRShare, D.ssRShare)
91
92consCutTerm :: C.RopCons c
93consCutTerm med =
94  do rmap <- Op.getRelmap med "-relmap"
95     Right $ relmapCutTerm med rmap
96
97relmapCutTerm :: C.Intmed c -> C.Relmap c -> C.Relmap c
98relmapCutTerm med = C.relmapBinary med relkitCutTerm
99
100relkitCutTerm :: C.RelkitBinary c
101relkitCutTerm = relkitProjectTerm (D.ssRSide, D.ssRSide)
102
103
104-- ----------------------  project
105
106relkitProjectTerm :: D.ShareSideMap2 D.NamedType c -> C.RelkitBinary c
107relkitProjectTerm _ (C.Relkit _ Nothing _) = const $ Right C.relkitNothing
108relkitProjectTerm lrMap (C.Relkit _ (Just he2) _) =
109    relkitProject lrMap $ D.getTermNames he2
110
111relkitProject :: D.ShareSideMap2 D.NamedType c -> [S.TermName] -> C.RelkitFlow c
112relkitProject _ _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
113relkitProject (heMap, boMap) ns (Just he1)
114    | null unk   = Right kit2
115    | otherwise  = Msg.unkTerm unk he1
116    where
117      lr    = D.shareSideOrd ns he1
118      unk   = D.ssLSideNames lr
119      he2   = heMap lr `D.headMap` he1
120      kit2  = C.relkitJust he2 $ C.RelkitOneToOne True $ boMap lr
121
122
123-- ----------------------  rename
124
125consRename :: C.RopCons c
126consRename med =
127  do np <- Op.getTermPairs med "-term"
128     Right $ relmapRename med np
129
130relmapRename :: C.Intmed c -> [S.TermName2] -> C.Relmap c
131relmapRename med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitMove . unzip . map B.swap
132
133
134-- ----------------------  move
135
136consMove :: C.RopCons c
137consMove med =
138  do ps <- Op.getTerms med "-from"
139     ns <- Op.getTerms med "-to"
140     Right $ relmapMove med (ps, ns)
141
142relmapMove :: C.Intmed c -> ([S.TermName], [S.TermName]) -> C.Relmap c
143relmapMove med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitMove
144
145relkitMove :: ([S.TermName], [S.TermName]) -> C.RelkitFlow c
146relkitMove _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
147relkitMove (ps, ns) (Just he1)
148    | B.notSameLength ps ns = Msg.oddAttr
149    | psDup   /= []         = Msg.dupTerm psDup he1
150    | ns2Dup  /= []         = Msg.dupTerm ns2Dup he2
151    | psLeft  /= []         = Msg.unkTerm psLeft he1
152    | otherwise             = Right kit2
153    where
154      ns1        =  D.getTermNames he1
155      ns2        =  D.getTermNames he2
156
157      ns2Dup     =  B.duplicates ns2
158      psDup      =  B.duplicates ps
159
160      psLeft     =  ps `B.snipLeft`  ns1
161      psIndex    =  ps `B.snipIndex` ns1
162
163      he2        =  D.headMap moveTerms he1
164      kit2       =  C.relkitJust he2 C.RelkitId
165
166      moveTerms ts       =  foldr moveTerm ts $ zip ns psIndex
167      moveTerm (n, i)    =  moveName n `B.mapAt` i
168      moveName n (_, t)  =  (n, t)
169
